field.name: product_id
field.on_change: product_id_change(product_id, uos_id, quantity, name, parent.type, parent.partner_id, parent.fiscal_position, price_unit, parent.currency_id, parent.company_id, context)

field.name: uos_id
field.on_change: uos_id_change(product_id, uos_id, quantity, name, parent.type, parent.partner_id, parent.fiscal_position, price_unit, parent.currency_id, parent.company_id, context)

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a quotation that will be converted into a purchase order.

Use this menu to search within your purchase orders by references, supplier, products, etc. For each purchase order, you can track the related discussion with the supplier, control the products received and control the supplier invoices.

record.field: Stock Value At Date with tax

div.p: The following routes will apply to the products in this category taking into account parent categories:
